website_summaries.verdict: Sharp-looking leather driving gloves that include holes for breathability in the fingers and palms.
pros: Multiple color options, including varying thread accent colors
Includes knuckle holes for maximum flexibility
Wrist area has a snap latch, which makes it easier to take the gloves on and off
cons: More expensive than many other leather glove options on the market

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, recommend getting one size smaller than you would normally wear
customer_reviews.text: Well stitched. I am a 6'1" male (~185.42 cm tall), 220 lb in weight. I have large hands, but the small size fits best. You want something very tight on your hands, and keep in mind that the leather will stretch over time. The finger length is a few millimeters too long, but other than that - a very good fit.
customer_reviews.author: [REDACTED]

customer_reviews.title: but they are beautifully crafted and fit nicely
customer_reviews.text: These gloves not only have that classic look, but they are beautifully crafted and fit nicely. Excellent workmanship and nice detail make these the perfect driving glove. I cannot say enough about how professional and service-oriented the seller is, too. I had originally ordered a Small, which was too tight, and I contacted the seller about getting a size Medium. The seller response time was immediate, and in no time, I had gone through the return process, and another pair showed up. Actually, I would HIGHLY recommend any product from this seller, just because of the quality service I received in dealing with this glove purchase. You will love having these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Shea

customer_reviews.title: Don't go based off of chart size.
customer_reviews.text: Sizing chart is incorrect. I ordered according to the chart and the "Medium" gloves that I received were way too large. They were more like a "Large" size and is not functional or comfortable being too big and long on the fingers. I just submitted for a refund. I keep hearing others say the fingers are too long and gloves are too big, I should have listened. I'm very disappointed especially having to return them without even an option to exchange them for a different size. They must know they are not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Waiting to See
customer_reviews.text: Update: They’ve stretched enough, in only a couple of days, to be comfortable. As suggested in the reviews, I got one size down, which was actually only a half size. I’ve been wearing them around the house to stretch them out because as of now, they’re too tight for me to fully bend my fingers without cutting off circulation, and the knuckle holes don’t quite line up. Also, these are NOT touch screen friendly, but that’s ok for me because I drive one handed anyway.
customer_reviews.author: A Noun

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as it looks!
customer_reviews.text: Neither soft or well made! I expected far better than this. It seems like the leather was not trimmed thin enough to make the gloves soft and apparently my hands are no longer medium and need to get large! Very Happy with customer service since I was able to return the gloves within one hour of receiving them.
customer_reviews.author: Fm

customer_reviews.title: Great driving gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Originally I intended to use these only for spirited driving. They fit so well and made the drivin experience so much better that I used them everyday. Not too cheap, but not too expensive either. These are my first pair of driving gloves so I have nothing to compare with. They are great. I like them. I'm satisfied. Update: Correction, it DOES work with touchscreen. The first time I tried it didn't work so I never tried again. By accident, today I found out that it works with touchscreen. Oops, I guess I'm one of those customers who unfairly blame the product. They are still great after a few months if daily uses. Still highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: I feel a bit pretentious when I wear this, but they are pretty great
customer_reviews.text: I live in a state where sometimes it gets very cold. My car has an aluminium shift knob, and it's a pain to use it when the car just starts. Also, I like to take long leisure drives from time to time, and my hands can feel a bit sore. These solve both of those problems. They also look great... although they would look better in a classic car instead of a WRX. Eh, you do what you need to do. They do match the upholstery.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo

customer_reviews.title: Not bad. Sizing issues.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves were way over sized. The fingers were also very long. I have pretty large hands and I ordered a medium. Im not sure if it was mislabeled or not. Quality of the leather was slightly above average, but not amazing. The color bleeds allot and they were not sealed well. The shipping time was fast. The gloves are decent over all if you order them smaller. In my opinion there are better alternatives with more accurate sizing for lower prices, but these are not a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Justaguy

customer_reviews.title: Better treatment for leather needed.
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves, fit well, comfortable, but they bleed like hell onto my hands. The leather could've used a better seal. It's a bit of a problem because I have tan/light leather seats, so I can't touch my seats after wearing these because over time it'll stain. Basically, they're amazing gloves, but I'm probably gonna have to do a treatment on them.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control, chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered medium for my fairly large hands. I wanted a tight fit. While the design was sharp and looked cool, one glove was bigger than the other and the palms were of different shapes. Poor quality control. My biggest gripe, however, was that the gloves STUNK of cancer. I work leather. I know quality tanning and the wonderful look and scent of quality tanned hide. This is not that. Get your Genuine Riparo gloves elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Missak

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sizing could be better.
customer_reviews.text: The leather that these gloves are made from feels awesome and gives great grip for shifting and steering. My main and really only issue is that the finger length is too long. I ordered small gloves because I have small hands- and also because I looked at the size chart and measured the length around my knuckles which matched the small size. I'd say that each finger is about 1 cm too long which doesn't help for trying to use the gloves to go to the ATM or trying to plug in my phone in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Bon Yen

customer_reviews.title: Super Nice Gloves
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these driving gloves because the leather in my steering wheel is a bit slippery. These gloves provides me with the grip I need when driving. Quick maneuvering or turning of the steering wheel is no longer an issue, especially when trying to get out of the way of a distracted driver. If I had to purchase these gloves again I would do it w/o hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fingertips a little boxy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these gloves in a medium. The leather is soft and (maybe a little too) thick. This should contribute to their lasting a while under continued use, but they are a little lacking from a tactile perspective. Another reviewer made a comment about the large snap button. It is large, but its a negative only from the aesthetics standpoint. My main complaint is that the fingertips could be sewn with a little more taper. The fingertips are cut with a more work glove pattern than I am used to in a driving glove. I might not order these again, but neither will I return them for they do have enough positive attributes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gloves for sure
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gloves for sure. Got them today, tried them on ( my hand size is 8.5 medium ) and they fit very nice. The snap on the wrist is well done and is secure. The stitching is very nice as well. With proper care, which includes not leaving them in direct sun light as this will dry them out and will lead to cracking and peeling, you should have these for a long while. As I have done in the past with similar gloves I condition ONLY the top part of the gloves with a leather conditioner as doing it on the palm side would reduce the grip of the leather and would have a hard time gripping things.
customer_reviews.author: denis drawe

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather with excellent stitch work.
customer_reviews.text: Just got these today, so can't speak of longevity. I had a similar pair that lasted for years Even though they were also large, they were slightly short in the fingers, so the index fingers of both hands eventually wore through the leather at the fingertip. I needed new gloves. The leather quality of these Riparo gloves is very good and the stitch work is excellent. The large, ordered based on the Amazon sizing chart, fit quite tightly, but the finger length is much better than my last pair. After having had this type of glove previously and considering the thickness of the leather, I am comfortable these will stretch to fit my hands perfectly. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JoeInTampa

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Great feel, perfect fit! However, I've noticed the sizes vary with colors and even types of gloves. These I believe are hand made so its expected but buyer beware! Just because you ordered a small, doesn't mean you wont need an extra small. Returns are to be expected to find the right fit. I like a tight feel on my hand and hate the "baggy" feel.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique H.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: I ordered to pair. The first one was correct and everything fit perfectly. The second pair was stitched together with the reverse colors and the fingers were way too short. The replacement for the second pair was also the reverse colors. Wish there was better quality control
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Clark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent durable feel. Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding. I bought the Prat and Hart and the Riparo ones, both full-finger leather driving gloves. Both are excellent. I was undecided on which to select, so I bought both. They look almost identical on the web photos, however, the Riparo feel thicker than the Prat and Hart, the Pratt are thinner leather. One is more heafty, the other more elegant. I will use the Riparo for the vintage motorbike, the Pratt and Hart for the auto. :). Very happy with my purchases. Hope this is helpful to those facing the same choice.
customer_reviews.author: Milo

customer_reviews.title: wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I wear this driving and to the gym. Have used these for years. Recent pairs are as good as the old ones. Wonderful craftsmanship. Interior feel is smooth. There is enough exterior traction for me to use machines at the gym very comfortably. Fit is good. I usually wear a size 7 glove and a large in these.
customer_reviews.author: Midura Chen

customer_reviews.title: Great look, color, and fit
customer_reviews.text: These are great-fitting and feeling gloves. The new leather smell and feel are awesome, but you need to break them in to soften them up. Sizing is about right; I don't have big hands, but my golf gloves are all large and these gloves fit me well in a large. I live in the south and would not wear these during the summer months...they're not perforated and my hands will sweat bacon grease. In the colder weather, these will give you a good grip on the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: melendezTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: I'll Take Your Whole Stock
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Riparo gloves and I just can't get enough of them! They feel and look badass in the best way! These are by far my favorite, the wrist cuff is awesome and they match my favorite boots and jacket perfectly! The leather is great quality and they hold up well over time (My first pair is 2 years old and they look great) just take care of them well!
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome look
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. They look very good with a leather jacket as well.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sizes 😡😡😡
customer_reviews.text: Wrong sizes .. I bought a large size gloves according to your hand size .. but you are wrong !!! I need an extra large size!!! I’m not happy at all .. angry 😠😡😡😡😡
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mohamed Mokhtar Satour

customer_reviews.title: COULD BE BETTER
customer_reviews.text: They fit a bit loosely but it may be that my perfect fit is between sizes. My major complaint is the difficulty unsnapping and resnapping the "wrist" snaps. With my arthritic fingers I will need to leave them unsnapped at all times. The quality seems fine, soft and supple. This is January in a cold area of NJ and I do not plan on using them until warmer weather in the Spring. Though not perfect for me, I think they will suffice well for driving.
customer_reviews.author: JRON

customer_reviews.title: Good gripping on my leather steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: I'm only 5'4" and have small hands. I ordered the small and they fit perfectly. In fact, a little hard to get on at first. But after wearing them for just a few times they are just right. The wrist snaps hold strong and I don't have to worry about them unsnapping. They are soft inside and out and you can pick up small objects without having to take them off. Good gripping on my leather steering wheel. The reason I bought driving gloves in the first place is that my hands sweat a lot and I don't want all salty sweat getting on my leather steering wheel and ruining it. Try these out and you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mikezen

customer_reviews.title: Order size per their chart, glove will soften and stretch
customer_reviews.text: Ordered large based on their chart and gloves fit well. Snug at first, but have definitely softened up and stretched a bit so fit is what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Gketg5

customer_reviews.title: Buy them.
customer_reviews.text: Been using them for 2 weeks now. I drive for my job and wanted to try these out to see if they make a difference. What a difference! Added comfort and grip. My hands dont sweat anymore. Golves hold up. Break in period is about a days worth of driving. It says they don't work with a touch screen but they do work with mine in the car. Dont know if it will work for all or not but they nice and they do their job.
customer_reviews.author: Justin St. George

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves!
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't write reviews but I had to with these gloves. They are awesome. The leather is the perfect thickness. Thick enough to give you some warmth but thin enough to be easily flexible. I measured my hand and was right at 8.5. I think I could have went a size smaller. My pinky finger is a tad short and has some extra material. I went with the tan color and really like the look.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: they've held up very well and they've broken in nicely to the shape of my hands
customer_reviews.text: I've had these gloves for several months now and I've used them for long road trips. So far, they've held up very well and they've broken in nicely to the shape of my hands. But, it does take a few weeks for the excess black dye to go away, so until then, expect to have black palms. A stylus-type material sewn to the index fingers would be a nice feature for those who use navigation apps on their phones. Oh well, I could just cut a hole or something.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Tight but nice
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a pair of gloves should. I little tight like it should be. Not for men with long fingers
customer_reviews.author: chunkycheez

customer_reviews.title: Leather quality very good. The gloves are well constructed and look great ...
customer_reviews.text: Leather quality very good. The gloves are well constructed and look great stylish. The only drawback are the fingers are a little too long, this is the second pair I purchased. The first pair was a medium and the fingers were way too long at least in the small I can live with the finger length.
customer_reviews.author: hotrodder 72

customer_reviews.title: Good fit across knuckles
customer_reviews.text: Good fit across knuckles. Most fingers fit, except for index and middle fingers on both hands. Thinking of sewing the fingers myself to make for a better fit. Snap at wrist is loose on left hand, but snug on right hand. Both gloves measure the same at the wrist. I didn't realize my right wrist was so much bigger. Leather is soft and interior seams aren't too annoying as is often the case with some gloves. Short of having custom made gloves, these aren't bad.
customer_reviews.author: D. Keith Solberg

customer_reviews.title: I may try again and get xxs because I DO think they are a beautiful glove and the company customer service was excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely gloves but they must be men's as even the small are far too large for me and I have fairly long fingers for a woman. I was confused because many of the reviews were by women... with no mention of a sizing problem and I couldn't really see where you could chose womens vs. mens versions. I may try again and get xxs because I DO think they are a beautiful glove and the company customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Bad stitching, uneven fit
customer_reviews.text: Bad stitching, uneven fit, wrong size, cheap leather, like pretty much everything else made in Pakistan (I wish Amazon bothered stating that openly in the description), disgusting chemical smell, etc. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Emin Kuliyev

customer_reviews.title: Fits like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality...holds onto my Subaru STI leather Riparo steering wheel and looks Great with identical wrx/sti Riparo leather interior
customer_reviews.author: search4truth

customer_reviews.title: Thick material and seems
customer_reviews.text: The unknown leather type is too thick for a driving glove. Hard to operate basic controls like radio, heater or headlights. Thick internal seems are not comfortable. Thumb hole is excessively large with room for 2 thumbs and bulky material into the palm. The gloves look nice and are well made. They are better suited as a work glove. If you want a well fitted driving glove look elsewhere. For the cost, these are not worth the trouble to return. Will see if my son can use them for riding his cycle or operating a chain saw.
customer_reviews.author: The Shultz

customer_reviews.title: Almost the perfect driving glove
customer_reviews.text: Almost the perfect driving glove. Only issue I have is that it is not reversed stitched so when grabbing the steering wheel of gear lever you are always feeling the stitching, which is uncomfortable. If they fixed this issue it would hands down be one of the best on the market for its price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jermunji

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought these gloves to match the stitching in my VW Jetta with black seats trimmed in red stitching. Can't beat the match and finish. A second skin
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. I measured 8 1/2 and ordered medium. A snug fit at first but broke in nicely after a couple of days. Good choice to see if you like gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Maglio

customer_reviews.title: They cheapened the leather, I DO NOT RECOMEND THESE GLOVES ANY LONGER!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pair of these gloves last year, they where great quality! BELIEVING THAT I WOULD RECEIVE THE SAME QUALITY I ORDERED A PAIR FOR MYSELF LAST WEEK, THESE GLOVES ARE NOT THE SAME QUALITY! THE LEATHER IS HALF AS THICK, THESE GLOVES FEEL CHEEP BUT HAVE THE SAME PRICE AS LAST YEAR! THEY MADE THEM WITH LESS QUALITY! VERY DISAPOINTED!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice looking however the index finger is much longer than ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking however the index finger is much longer than the other fingers when the gloves are on, so I think their model is out of sorts. This means I am always pulling on them so they fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: flcnplt

customer_reviews.title: The look of these gloves.
customer_reviews.text: This my second pair of purchased gloves. This is feels a bit larger even though they both are XL size. I'm hoping this pair will shrink a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sizing
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was crap. Ordered a size small my glove size is 8. They are almost an inch too long, fit loosely, and are more of a nuisance than anything to wear while driving. If they were actually the right size however, they are made well and look great until you get them on your hand. Order a size down if you get these. And if you weae a small, just get a different pair. Ill be giving mine to a friend and ordering some gaspar driving gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: The leather appears to be good quality. However
customer_reviews.text: These are well made gloves. The leather appears to be good quality. However, I had to order a size up for a good fit. Normally I wear large but had to reorder extra-large and still they are a bit tight when clenching my fists, or grabbing a car steering wheel. They'll need to be broken in just a bit. But no problem, the quality is worth it. And yes, I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Breuckelen van Twiller

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a large hand but sellers instructions and measured my hand which said I needed a large glove. I was skeptical but I ordered large. When I first put the gloves on they were very tight but have used them several times now and gloves are perfect size. Gloves are very sturdy and well made and are comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: GREAT gloves
customer_reviews.text: A really well-made set of fingerless driving gloves. I returned these because they were too small for me, but would be great if I did not need access to touch screen controls.
customer_reviews.author: babydoc

customer_reviews.title: Driving gloves
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars gladly, however I couldn't get a size to fit my hands. I got the medium, the glove body fits well but the fingers are too long. The gloves are very, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: CSR

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. The leather is soft, supple, and feels like it's quality construction. These are supposed to fit snug, so try a size smaller than recommended by the sizing chart. The chart says I should use Large, but they were too long in the fingers. So, I returned for an exchange and got Medium, which fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mostly Harmless

customer_reviews.title: Buttery soft driving gloves
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. These gloves do run just a little bit bigger than actual size, but not problem with that. Awesome contrast red stitching make gloves look cool 😎
customer_reviews.author: Dean Seiler

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: They seem to fit really well. Of course there is some "breaking in" process but I really like how they feel, including the snap shut closure. My previous gloves used velcro. Unfortunately the velcro began pulling away from the glove causing them to loose their snugness on my hands. These gloves, on the other hand, fit good.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki B.

customer_reviews.title: Right thumb is not tailored correctly.
customer_reviews.text: The frist pair I bought was amazing and I gave them to a friend so bought another pair, but the one that came right thumb is not tailored correctly. A little uncomfortable on my thumb. The reason for 3 stars is for the first pair that were basically perfect so I hope this helps someone.
customer_reviews.author: arthur daniels

customer_reviews.title: These gloves exceed my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves exceed my expectations!. Great quality leather, the snaps are strong, the workmanship, the detail and overall the gloves are excellent. They fit great, a little on the tight side, but with any leather material item, they have to be broken in first. Highly recommend these gloves to anyone looking for great quality 100% leather driving gloves. The seller is excellent, they ship fast, and will buy from them again. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Art lover cat

customer_reviews.title: What a glove!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this a lot. He uses it all the time while driving his car......
customer_reviews.author: rams

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but sized small
customer_reviews.text: Gloves appear to be excellent quality but the reviews seemed to indicate they were sized big. I ordered down due to these comments. Big mistake. Had to send the gloves back.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: not bad, fingers are too long
customer_reviews.text: great gloves BUT, the fingers are too long. I’m not an ape
customer_reviews.author: joe shmoe

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made but not sized
customer_reviews.text: finger are waaaay too long. Nicely made but not sized right
customer_reviews.author: k Madison Moore

customer_reviews.title: Real review: great
customer_reviews.text: Your gonna love these. These are real leather and you can tell right as you put them on. Unfortunately because of that they are made thick. Being it harder to push buttons on a stereo but not impossible. The knuckle holes are also off by a good margin. Fell good and Greta from my longish fingers
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Fox

customer_reviews.title: Good product; would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Fits well and conforms to hand over time. Color is beautiful and has held up well. Nice to drive in. Loses 1 star for minimal color bleeding from the lining; sometimes on very hot days my hand will be slightly pinkish when I take them off. But I have had them for 4 months and love them.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Felkner

customer_reviews.title: Sized Wrong
customer_reviews.text: The fingers on the gloves are way too long and I did not realize this until I went to wear them today and I am 1 day past the date they could be returned. I would have worn them sooner but with the quarantine I did not take my car out.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Sciortino

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the glove is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have large hands the fingers were a little long so I took him to my Taylor and he shortened them for me otherwise the fit was good and the quality of the leather excellent I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: splivey

customer_reviews.title: Love Wearing It in My Convertible
customer_reviews.text: I only wear it when I drive my convertible, so if you have a convertible - you should get one.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Henwood

customer_reviews.title: ... gave it a 5 stars because the quality is great but the wrist size and length of the fingers ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it a 4 stars because the quality is great but the wrist size and length of the fingers is a bit off, fingers is about 6mm off and wrist is about 15mm, I ordered a Medium and measured my knuckles before the purchased. So if you are a Large order a Medium that's what I'm trying to say here!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The material was very nice and the glove looked very cool
customer_reviews.text: The material was very nice and the glove looked very cool. The fit was a little loose which is why I gave it only 4 stars. I'm also not sure if it was really worth the $40 plus it cost to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Edward

customer_reviews.title: These are much better than the last pair I had, which were different style and make
customer_reviews.text: The gloves were a good fit. Snug, but not tight. They seem to be just the right thickness in order to handle the driving. They appear to be of excellent quality and workmanship. Very pleased with them
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love these gloves for driving
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves for driving, Although I was Leary of buying a small size, I followed the chart and I'm glad I did. A little tight first time I wore them but now they fit perfectly. Love the leather smell and quality of the glove.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: They didn't fit but only because I have short stubby sausage fingers if I go any smaller they wouldn't fit my palm, but great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Too feminine - and comes in cheap plastic sleeve only
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a gift for a man who loves to drive but it came in a cheap plastic sleeve so it was wrinkled. Also, it was very feminine. Not suitable for a man.
customer_reviews.author: CareBear

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Great driving glove and good to wear with this corona virus
customer_reviews.author: Edward A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best driving gloves u can buy
customer_reviews.text: I've had several pair of driving gloves. But these are the only ones that feel like driving. After a few wares you want take them off. I got the camel pair and let me tell you chicks complement me on them more times than I can count. If you want a real pair of driving gloves you want ever want to take off, these are them...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would like to get the same product
customer_reviews.text: I like the gloves a lot, but there was a flaw in the first pair I received. I sent them back and requested for a replacement pair. The replacement pair I received were not the same soft leather and also are not touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: AnthonyTejada

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great fitment. Buy smaller size than you think. I’m 6’3” with what everyone thinks are huge hands. But the sizing guide (and my own experience) told me to order a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Somerville

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful gloves. Nicely made, fit well, and good quality leather. I enjoy wearing them when driving my world class sports car (MINI Cooper S).
customer_reviews.author: Adam's eyes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected, however the dye comes off on your hands, and the thumb is somewhat larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Olufeme

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying at all. (Red leather)
customer_reviews.text: These stain my hands bright red and I’m worried they will ruin my interior. Bad gloves would appreciate a refund please. Other colors might be fine but the amount of stain is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: HUnter

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: i originally ordered a large size. i wear 10 1/2 boot but order larger. my first pair was big, i returned them and the ones i got are great!
customer_reviews.author: profetarmageddon

customer_reviews.title: Glove Fingers are way to long
customer_reviews.text: The gloves look and feel great; however the finger length is about 1” to long. This sizing issue is consistent across all sizes large, medium and small as I have ordered and returned a pair for each size offered. If you have very, I mean very long fingers, then your looking at a nice glove.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are great!!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great!!! I drive for a living right now and they are comfortable, have a fair amount of dexterity look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Brown Fam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent gloves. If you have short fingers, go down a size. I usually wear a 7, but the fingers on the 7 fit like an 8. Go down a size. This sort of displeased me.
customer_reviews.author: Vinny C

customer_reviews.title: High quality and fitment is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and they feel great when wearing them, fitment was spot on!
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Fingers too long
customer_reviews.text: Found the fingers to be a little too long. Other reviews see to also confirm this. Quality is excellent, just wish the fingers were shorter.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wood

customer_reviews.title: and feel great! The fingers are a little bit long
customer_reviews.text: These gloves look, fit, and feel great! The fingers are a little bit long, but mine are a bit stubby.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Bong

customer_reviews.title: used them while making a 2500 mile road trip and they exceed my expectations for a very good pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: The gloves fit very well, used them while making a 2500 mile road trip and they exceed my expectations for a very good pair of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Adhesion to the steering wheel is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the package they feel like a perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made in China??
customer_reviews.text: Tight for average wrist and palm.., and crazy long fingers and who has thumbs that long. Leather,stitching and color not bad. Made in China impression not good.
customer_reviews.author: American cook

customer_reviews.title: Good Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Not a perfect fit (little bit snug, following their measuring guide), but good gloves overall. Don’t buy these for warmth, the cold will cut right through them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Better treatment for leather needed.
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves, fit well, comfortable, but they bleed like hell onto my hands. The leather could've used a better seal. It's a bit of a problem because I have tan/light leather seats, so I can't touch my seats after wearing these because over time it'll stain. Basically, they're amazing gloves, but I'm probably gonna have to do a treatment on them.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Scary!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! I was scared that they were still going to be still too large, but the XS fits wonderfully! They work for fashion as well as riding! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chow-Yen

customer_reviews.title: They look great, but the fingers are way too long
customer_reviews.text: They look great, but the fingers are way too long! Unless you are Hoagy Carmichael they simply won't work so into the trash they go!!!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Very good value for the price. Maximum wrist circumference 7.5". 40 / 45mm wristwatch may interfere with snap.
customer_reviews.author: SEFAC

customer_reviews.title: Sure footed hands
customer_reviews.text: They're very well constructed, unlined leather driving gloves. I've put them in my car's apt named glove box for handy (sorry) access.
customer_reviews.author: ecrutle

customer_reviews.title: Send them back.
customer_reviews.text: Let's start off by saying, the left hand was bigger than the right hand. They were supposed to be a small but, they were mediums. I won't get them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice rich grain leather but a little medium was smaller than I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: CTH

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit Ok - But look and Feel Cheap - Edge look cheap cuts..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift for my sweet guy. He loves the Riparo driving gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my sweet guy. He loves the Riparo driving gloves!! Seem to run a little small though. We had to return original pair to get a larger size. Other than that, he is are perfectly happy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mastin

customer_reviews.title: Overall appeal of driving gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Still a little too big, just slightly! Perhaps, they will shrink with wear! Leather is a bit too thick reducing tactile sensitivity! Construction is good! Black with red stitching is appealing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Fits reasonably well for me. Fingers are actually long enough, and reasonably thin which is great for driving gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear and fit well, bought these for my brother and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: snug fit, long fingers
customer_reviews.text: Fingers are too long . . . At least 1/2 per finger, the rest, is good
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The gloves came fast and they look great .The large fit great and feel soft.
customer_reviews.author: christian m. eliat

customer_reviews.title: Riparo Genuine Leather Full-finger Driving Gloves are a great choice
customer_reviews.text: Great quality gloves! I liked how you had several options to choose from and XL fit well with a nice attention to detail on the make and quality. The button clicks well too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Morley

product_meta.title: Riparo Genuine Leather Full-finger Driving Gloves
product_meta.description:
These genuine leather driving gloves have the quality and the features you would expect from a pair of quality driving gloves , including soft supple leather, knuckle holes and a snap closure on the wrist strap.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :9.2 x 4.3 x 1 inches; 3.2 Ounces
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :December 1, 2016
 * ASIN :B01MQRSZBK

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #103,432 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #60 inMen's Cold Weather Gloves 
    *  #26529 inMen's Shops 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.3 out of 5 stars422 ratings These genuine leather driving gloves have the quality and the features you would expect from a pair of quality driving gloves , including soft supple leather, knuckle holes and a snap closure on the wrist strap.
